blogPost.title: With 73% of companies reported, Q4 S&P 500 GAAP earnings are down 18% over the prior year. $SPX https://t.co/RBX5Uum6D4
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 73%的公司报告，第四季度S＆amp;P 500的GAAP收益比上年下降18%。$SPX https://t.co/RBX5Uum6D4
73%的公司報告，第四季度S＆amp;P 500的GAAP收益比上年下降18%。$SPX https://t.co/RBX5Uum6D4

previous.excerpt:
I currently own 15 stocks. One of those stocks is AMC. The 14 others are a
combination of tech, EV, and weed stocks. Most high risk/high reward but a few
“safe” bets such as AAPL, AMD, and NVDA.

I bought AMC at $15.85 a couple of days before it tanked. I’ve been holding it
hoping that it recovers…
previous.title: At what point should we come to terms that AMC won’t see $15.00 for a long while?

localize.title: 我们应该在什么时候达成AMC在很长一段时间内看不到15.00美元的条件？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我目前拥有15只股票。其中一只股票是AMC。其他14只股票是
科技、电动车、杂草股的组合。大多数高风险/高回报，但少数
"安全 "的赌注，如AAPL、AMD和NVDA。

几天前，我以15.85美元的价格买入了AMC，然后它就跌停了。我一直持有它
希望它恢复...

localize.title: 我們應該在什麼時候達成AMC在很長一段時間內看不到15.00美元的條件？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我目前擁有15只股票。其中一隻股票是AMC。其他14只股票是
科技、電動車、雜草股的組合。大多數高風險/高回報，但少數
"安全 "的賭注，如AAPL、AMD和NVDA。

幾天前，我以15.85美元的價格買入了AMC，然後它就跌停了。我一直持有它
希望它恢復...
